thread.title: Will Apple deliver a Taylor Swift surprise?
thread.title_full: Will Apple deliver a Taylor Swift surprise?

title: Will Apple deliver a Taylor Swift surprise?
text:
Major eyeliner? Check. All-gold-everything? Check. It must be time for the VMAs! Taylor Swift made a splash on the red carpet. Keep clicking to see who else showed up... (Photo: Frazer Harrison, Getty Images)
18 CONNECT 103 TWEET 3 LINKEDIN 7 COMMENT EMAIL MORE We've already speculated about the next iPhone, a 12-inch iPad and a revamped Apple TV. So far, the only thing we haven't touched is the closing musical guest.
As many Apple fans recall, the company ends every iPhone event with a musical number. Last year, it was U2 (remember how we all got that album on our iPhones we didn't want ?).
This year, there is talk of Apple's newest friend — pop star Taylor Swift — wrapping up the event. Fortune seems to think it will happen , despite the fact that Swift will perform a concert in Houston later Wednesday.
"Flights from San Francisco to Houston take 3:45 hours gate to gate—plenty of time to hop from a 10-12 a.m. event in San Francisco to a 7 p.m. show in Houston, even with the 2 hour time difference," writes Fortune 's Philip Elmer DeWitt.
Swift and Apple are now best buds after the singer offered her album 1989 exclusively on the company's Apple Music service. The deal was reached after Swift prodded the tech giant to pay royalties for streaming music.
Follow Brett Molina on Twitter: @brettmolina23 .
